content.text:
# List of wars involving Republika Srpska

This is a list of wars involving Republika Srpska, a Serb-majority entity of Bosnia and Herzegovina.
List
{| class="wikitable"
! width="170px" |Conflict
! width="190px" |Combatant 1
! width="190px" |Combatant 2
! width="320px" |Result
|-
|style="background:#efefef"| 1992 Yugoslav campaign in Bosnia(1992)
|style="background:#efefef"|
|style="background:#efefef"|  Yugoslavia
|style="background:#D0FFD0"| Victory
*Republika Srpska formed as a separate Serb state from Bosnia
*TOBiH and HV eliminated from Foča, Višegrad, Prijedor, Ilidža, Zvornik, Kupres, Doboj, Brčko, Bijeljina, Bosanski Šamac and more
*Establishment of the VRS
*The JNA leaves Bosnia due to agreements with the UN and were replaced by the VRS
|-
|Croatian War of Independence (1992–1995)
|Support:
|
|style="background:#FFD0D0"|Defeat
* Croatian forces regained control over most of Republic of Serbian Krajina-held territory
* Croatian forces advanced into Bosnia and Herzegovina to assist the united Bosnian and Croatian armed forces
|-
|Bosnian War (1992–1995)
| Western Bosnia
Support:
| (1995)
|style="background:#E0D0FF"|Dayton Agreement
* Internal partition of Bosnia and Herzegovina, Republika Srpska internationally recognized as one of two entities
|}
See also
* List of wars involving Bosnia and Herzegovina
* List of wars involving Serbia
* List of wars involving Yugoslavia
